name: Sandwich King
description:
You have 30 seconds to make a sandwich for your family with the ingredients on the conveyor belt . But watch out! not every thing there is edible! You can grab;

* Cheese

* Salami

* Bread

* Ham

* Peanut Butter

* Jelly

* Cucumber

* Tofu

* Rice

But dont grab:

* A shoe

* Car Keys

* Tax Forms

* Rotten Food

* A small Child

* Plastic
